title: my Pin isn’t unlocking the phone, rather it is freezing temporarily and saying wrong password
content: I’ve tried to type in my password, I’ve also tried to reboot my phone, I’ve tried to wait an hour kept the power off and charge my phone to 400% battery and it still hasn’t worked every time I type in my password and I have the check mark it freezes and then tells me after 10 seconds 15 seconds that the password is wrong
